Name: LoBlocks
About the game: THE GAME: In LoBlocks, the player must destroy all blocks to go to the next level. But to do it, you should solve a lot of challenging puzzle matching colors and amount of blocks with the same color. FEATURES: - 50 challenging levels; - 2 game modes (Arcade and classic with levels); - Ranking online for arcade mode; - Relaxing atmosphere; - Authorial soundtrack in LoFi style; - Pixel art;
